channel.title: Golang on Test Site
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Test Site

item.title: about
item.description: My name is Manuel A. Rodriguez, I am a software developer currently working in the games industry. Currently I specialize in back end services development and architecture. I love learning new things, and am always looking to learn more. Scratching a curiosity itch is one of my favorite pass times. Currently, I work mostly in Go and C++. Dabbling with Rust in my free time. My résumé.
